        • FPS
          int FPS
          The frame rate (FPS).
        • game
          Game game
          The game to render.

          The main BufferedImage, which the Renderer uses to draw on.

          int height
          The width and height of this instance.
        • originalUnitSize
          int originalUnitSize
          The unit size of sprites.
        • scale
          int scale
          The desired scale.
        • unitSize
          int unitSize
          The actual unit size of sprites after scaling.

          The width and height of this instance.
